description: This Dart source file defines the AuthService class responsible for handling user authentication processes, including login, registration, logout, and token management in a mobile application.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A service class managing user authentication by interfacing with backend API endpoints, handling token storage and retrieval.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs user login by sending credentials to server, stores received token, and returns a User object.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with provided credentials, stores the received token, and returns a User object.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the user by calling the server endpoint and clearing the stored authentication token.

methods.name: getStoredToken
methods.description: Retrieves the stored authentication token from shared preferences.
